features: LOCK IN MOISTURE: Dove Rejuvenating Beauty Bar gently cleanses and nourishes skin, as its bright scent of pomegranate and hibiscus tea helps refresh you and your skin better than ordinary bar soap
EFFECTIVE CLEANSER: Gently wash away dirt and germs, for use every day on body, face, and hands. This Dove Beauty Bar creates luxurious lather and won’t dry your skin like an ordinary soap bar
1 DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED: Formulated with ¼ moisturizing cream, Dove moisturizing Beauty Bar and gentle skin cleanser leaves skin instantly soft and smooth with lasting nourishment
VERSATILE CLEANSER: The unique formulation for effective skin care can be enjoyed by the entire family as this all-in-one cleanser nourishes your face, body, and hands for beautiful skin
THOUGHTFULLY MADE: This Beauty Bar is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA and sulfate free cleansers, so you can feel good about switching from ordinary bar soap to Dove Beauty Bar
CARE WITH YOUR CLEANSER: Our mission is to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look, helping them raise their self-esteem
body.description: We created a range of skin cleansing and skin care products designed to leave you and your skin feeling refreshed. The secret to beautiful skin is moisture, and no other bar soap hydrates.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At a Glance: Mild cleanser won't strip moisture from skin Leaves no soapy residue Hydrates with 1/4 moisturizing cream Cheerful pomegranate and lemon verbena scent Leaves skin fresh and revived #1 dermatologist recommended* Dove Go Fresh Revive Beauty Bar Revive with Pomegranate and Lemon Verbena Scent Quench your skin with the Dove Go Fresh Revive Beauty Bar. Its light formula contains 1/4 moisturizing cream to relieve dry skin. With the sparkling scent of pomegranate and lemon verbena, this beauty bar awakens your senses, so you feel fresh and revived. *According to a 2016 independent survey conducted by IPSOS among US dermatologists. What's in the Box: Dove Go Fresh Revive Beauty Bar, 4 Ounces, 6 Count

Mild Cleansers and Moisturizing Cream Won't Dry Out Skin The harsh ingredients in ordinary bar soap can strip your skin's natural moisture and leave a soapy residue, making skin feel tight and dry. With mild cleansers and 1/4 moisturizing cream, the Dove Go Fresh Revive Beauty Bar cleanses gently and rinses well. That means your skin will feel clean, soft, and smooth.

About Dove Dove launched in 1957 in the U.S. with the iconic Dove Beauty Bar, and continues to focus on real care with products that tangibly improve the condition of skin or hair. From the beginning, Dove has drawn inspiration from real, diverse women and celebrates real beauty, which they define as feeling and looking your best. Dove is committed to helping women and girls build positive self-esteem, develop a healthy relationship with beauty, and reach their full potential. Through Dove's Self-Esteem Fund, the brand has provided self-esteem tools and resources to reach over 11 million girls and counting.

Dove Exfoliating Body Polish Macadamia & Rice Milk Body Scrub, 10.5 oz Dove Go Fresh Revive Beauty Bar, 4 oz, 6 Bars Dove Nutritive Solutions Shampoo Intensive Repair, 12 oz Dove Nutritive Solutions Conditioner Intensive Repair, 12 oz Dove Advanced Care Antiperspirant Original Clean, 2.6 oz For Your Everyday Beauty Regimen Step 1: Exfoliate Step 2: Cleanse Step 3: Shampoo Step 4: Condition Step 5: Protect Underarms About Exfoliating body scrub that removes dull, dry skin. Whipped texture with beautifully creamy coverage. Formulated with ¼ moisturizing cream. Add a polish 3-4 times a week to exfoliate and nourish skin before you cleanse. #1 Dermatologist recommended bar.* Leaves skin softer, smoother and more radiant-looking vs. ordinary soap. Formulated with ¼ moisturizing cream and mild cleansers. Suitable for daily use on face, body and hands. Nutri-Keratin Repair Actives help repair damage deep inside hair. Restores hair's strength against breakage and split ends. Use with Intensive Repair conditioner. Suitable for daily use. Nutri-Keratin Repair Actives help repair damage deep inside hair. Helps detangle and improves manageability. Use with Intensive Repair shampoo. Suitable for daily use. Protects against underarm wetness and odor. 0% alcohol (ethanol) formula helps with shaving irritation. Contains Dove NutriumMoisture and ¼ moisturizers. Up to 48 hours of antiperspirant protection. Available Sizes: 10.5 oz 2 Bar, 3 Bar, 4 Bar, 6 Bar, 8 Bar, 10 Bar 12 oz & 20.4 oz 12 oz & 20.4 oz 2.6 oz Available Variants: Pomegranate Seeds & Shea Butter, Kiwi Seeds & Cool Aloe White, Sensitive Skin, Shea Butter, Cool Moisture, Pink, Exfoliating, Dry Oil, Coconut Milk, Sweet Cream & Peony, Rejuvenate, Micellar Water Daily Moisture, Absolute Curls, Anti-Frizz, Color Care, Oxygen Moisture, Radiant Shine, Purify & Strengthen Daily Moisture, Absolute Curls, Anti-Frizz, Color Care, Oxygen Moisture, Radiant Shine, Purify & Strengthen Clear Finish, Sheer Cool, Cool Essentials

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works even better than the original white bar.
reviews.reviewText: Some reviews are difficult to write,especially when I'm unhappy with a product.However that's not the case here.Using Dove white bar cleanser for many years with better than amazing results,as it has kept my skin as young looking as possible for being in my early 50s. Concurrently I'd never consider switching even if I was being paid to do so.However when Dove introduced this new bar,infused with the essence of pomegranate,hibiscus tea,and lemon verbena I decided to give it a shot.Happily I wasn't disappointed and know others won't be.Functioning just as well or even a bit better in my opinion,than the original white.This bar will leave your skin refreshed and rejuvenated.Also I can guarantee that if you commit to using it twice daily,you will experience equally amazing results.The intoxicating combined scents of the pomegranate,hibiscus and lemon verbena will keep you wanting more,taking you on a trip to a tropical paridise.As for my brothers out there,if your gonna be hung up about using a pink cleanser on your face,your missing out.Men have skin too and if you wanna stay in the game,you gotta look your best.A good facial care routine is vital for everyone,women and men alike,and it's never too early to start.There's so many reasons to love this product including its affordable price.However what I like and appreciate most is that this product is PETA certified,so no animals were harmed when making it,which is huge plus.As stated earlier some reviews are difficult to write,however this was extremely easy.My words in this review,easily flowed with speed and sincerity,indicating just how much I like and recommend this product.

reviews.reviewText: I love the scent of this soap and overall it lathers really great and makes my skin feel nice and clean. My only complaint is that I hate they wrap the pack in plastic wish they’d wrap it in something more eco friendly.

reviews.reviewText: Normall dove finds pound shop every way
You can’t get the full range of Dove soap scents in Australia. Love that I can’t still purchase online and this scent is heavenly plus you get the Dove soap benefits.

reviews.reviewTitle: I paid $Au $120 for 6 bars of soap. I returned it..
reviews.reviewText: I love this soap but disappointed that I was charged this much for it..I purchased now elsewhere in US 8 bars for $60 $Au including postage
Smells amazing! Wish it wasn't so expensive though
